Package oshi.jna.platform.unix

package oshi.jna.platform.unix
Provides extensions of JNA libraries for Unix. These classes should be considered non-API as they may be removed if/when their code is incorporated into the JNA project.
  • Class
    Description
    AixLibc
    C library.
    AixLibc.AixLwpsInfo
     
    AixLibc.AixPsInfo
     
    AixLibc.Timestruc
    64-bit timestruc required for psinfo structure
